DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multi-site, unmasked PMS Study. The purpose of the study is to evaluate the physical effects of Systane Lubricant Eye Drops.
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Site Post Marketing Surveillance Study for Systane in Indian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a multi-site, unmasked PMS Study. The purpose of the study is to evaluate the physical effects of Systane Lubricant Eye Drops. The assessed effects include: corneal and conjunctival staining, and ocular signs and symptoms. This is a two week prospective study.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older, of both sexes, and any race. Willing and able to make all required visits and follow study instructions. A sodium fluorescein corneal staining sum of >/ 3 in either eye. A bestcorrected visual acuity of 0.6 log MAR or better in each eye as assessed during an ETDRS chart A history or evidence of ocular or intraocular surgery in either eye within the past 6 months. Lasik patients can be included if Lasik surgery was > 6 months prior to the initiation of the study. A history of intolerance or hypersensitivity to any component of the study medications.
